The first photo in the collage: showing a trash-filled beach, was not taken during the presidency of Benigno Aquino III, as it was traced back to a Philippine Star report on a typhoon aftermath in September 2018.
The second photo in the collage: depicting a clean beach, was also not taken following the announcement of a proposed white sand beach at Manila Bay in September 2020. It had been circulating since at least February 2019 in posts related to a Manila Bay clean-up.
The two photos were not taken at the sam: as one corresponds to the Manila Baywalk, where the government planned to develop the artificial white sand beach, while the other was taken at Baseco beach.
